projectGridLines.title: Title: Intelligent Asset Generation  using Generative AI, Project 2  Title: Creative Master Generation using Generative AI, Project 3  Title: AI based creative resizer
projectGridLines.description:
Project 1

Title: Intelligent Asset Generation  using Generative AI

Description: Image processing is an important aspect of the ad tech industry. Images need to be generated in order to deliver the best ad experience to the end-user. This is a time-taking, manual task which is a big challenge for our customers today. This may also involve merging different image assets and backgrounds and automating the process of developing creative assets. We envision using GenAI technology and embed that into our enterprise product to make it easier for customers at large.

Skill sets: Strong CS fundamentals, Knowledge of Gen AI tools/APIs

Traits expectation: Good at research and exploration

Expected learning: Enterprise software development + Technical growth (Java/Scala/React/Go) + Learning to handle scale

Specific courses required for project execution:  

Project 2

Title: Creative Master Generation using Generative AI

Description: Jivox IQ uses "Creative Masters" which are HTML5 or Adobe After Effects files as an input for automated creative versioning. As of today, brands hire creative agencies to develop these creative masters which is slow and costly process. We envision using Generative AI to churn out full fledged HTML5 masters or videos which can be directly imported into Jivox IQ platform for creative versioning.

Skill sets: Strong CS fundamentals, Knowledge of Gen AI tools/APIs + HTML5

Traits expectation: Good at research and exploration

Expected learning: Enterprise software development + Technical growth (Java/Scala/React/Go) + Learning to handle scale

Specific courses required for project execution: 

Project 3

Title: AI based creative resizer

Description: Jivox IQ uses "Creative Masters" which are HTML5 files as an input for automated creative versioning. The creative master defines the elements that would be in the ad, for example a copy (text), a call-to-action, a product image, etc. and their relative placement in the ad. Hence, different ad sizes would require different creative masters, adding on to the manual task of building creative masters. The problem statement here is to  develop a prototype that would automate laying out the ad elements for different ad sizes using one ad size as a reference.

Skill sets: CS fundamentals, interest in generative AI

Traits expectation: Exploration, Research

Expected learning: Expected learning: Enterprise software development + Technical growth (Java/Scala/React/Go) + Learning to handle scale

Specific courses required for project execution:
